prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

The future of software development is shifting towards using plain human languages like English, French, or Latin, which will be both understandable and executable by humans and machines. This represents a significant paradigm shift in the field of programming.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
